News.headline: Loan Announcement: Jimmy Shepherd Joins East Grinstead
News.page_title: Loan Announcement: Jimmy Shepherd Joins East Grinstead
News.URL_keywords: Loan Announcement: Jimmy Shepherd Joins East Grinstead
News.short_description: Defender Jimmy Shepherd has joined East Grinstead on a one month loan
News.description:
The Daggers can announce that defender Jimmy Shepherd has signed on loan with Isthmian League South Division side East Grinstead until Saturday 22nd April.

The defender has had loan spells at Egham Town, Billericay Town and Whitehawk FC so far this season, making a total of sixteen appearances.

Follow us on our Social Media sites for updates on how Jimmy Shepherd is getting on at East Grinstead. 

Facebook: @OfficialDaggers 

Twitter: @Dag_RedFC
